title: Questions in life?
text: when you use your indicator levers - there's an audible ticking sound. This ticking sound increases if you need your bulbs changed , or if there is faulty wiring etc... anyway I was just wondering how that ticking sound is made? Does it emanate from speakers behind the dash or is there some kind of physical device inside that ticks? I know this question sounds daft but I'm serious, have always wondered an cannot be bothered to google it thanks
